Room.Name: Netherworld Lane/Oceanview Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the junction of Netherworld Lane and Oceanview Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Netherworld Lane heads east from this point and proceeds all the way to the east side of town. The road gets its name by passing on the north side of the Necropolis, towards the center of town. Oceanview Drive is a more scenic route with less traffic for those who want to enjoy the many pleasures the city has to offer.
